xmlText.p: First Period_1, Detroit, Daley 3 (Bertuzzi, Athanasiou), 0:44. 2, Dallas, Faksa 11 (Klingberg, Lindell), 2:48. 3, Dallas, Spezza 6 (Radulov, Klingberg), 8:55 (pp). Penalties_Witkowski, DET, (elbowing), 6:56; Turgeon, DET, (delay of game), 7:50; Hanzal, DAL, (tripping), 9:11.

Second Period_4, Detroit, Athanasiou 10 (Bertuzzi, Kronwall), 11:43. 5, Dallas, Spezza 7 (Benn, Radulov), 14:08 (pp). Penalties_Radulov, DAL, (hooking), 7:18; Witkowski, DET, Major (fighting), 13:03; Witkowski, DET, served by Frk, (roughing), 13:03; Johns, DAL, Major (fighting), 13:03.
Third Period_6, Dallas, Hanzal 4 (Elie, Johns), 9:13. Penalties_Benn, DAL, (slashing), 20:00.
Goalies_Dallas, Bishop 20-12-2 (15 shots-13 saves). Detroit, Howard 14-14-6 (26-22).
Referees_Jon Mclsaac, Francois St Laurent. Linesmen_David Brisebois, Mark Shewchyk.
